alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Hermosa Foot Hills; Rapid City; Southern Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 12:29AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Custer and southwestern Pennington Counties through 100 AM MDT... At 1228 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hill City, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Palmer Gulch Resort, Black Elk Peak and northwestern Custer State Park around 1235 AM MDT. Horse Thief Lake, Mount Rushmore National Memorial, Keystone Wye and Sheridan Lake around 1240 AM MDT. Keystone around 1245 AM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hayward, Rockerville and Bear Country. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 AM MDT for southwestern and west central South Dakota.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Hermosa Foot Hills; Rapid City; Southern Black Hills
